description:
OBJECTIVES
Aim of this course is to introduce participants to hedge funds, their basic structure, the various parties involved with investing and valuation process. You will also be shown how to calculate a basic NAV calculation for a hedge fund.

After taking this course you will be able explain below:
What a hedge fund is

Key characteristics of a hedge fund
Basic financial structure of a hedge fund
Understand the role performed by different parties to a hedge fund
Calculate a basic Net Asset Value (NAV) for a hedge fund
title: Hedge Fund Accounting and Valuation
